Name: A Gap in the Armor
Extra information: The last fight damaged your armor, and you must spend a few moments to repair it.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
You have a -4 penalty to AC while this curse is active.
If you do not move during your Hero Phase, discard this card.

Name: Bad Luck
Extra information: A curse brings misfortune to you and your allies.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
At the start of your Villain Phase, draw 1 additional Encounter Card.
Roll at the end of your Villain Phase: 10+ discard this card.

Name: Bloodlust
Extra information: The furious need for destruction fills your mind.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
At the start of your Hero Phase, you take 1 damage.
Discard this card when you defeat a Monster.

Name: Cage
Extra information: Stepping on a pressure plate causes a cage to drop on top of you!
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
You take a -2 penalty to AC and you cannot move while this curse is active.
Instead of attacking, you or a Hero on your tile can attempt to open the cage.
OPEN THE CAGE: Roll 10+
Discard this card when the cage is opened.

Name: Dragon Fear
Extra information: The very presence of the red dragon in the dungeon fills you with an unrelenting sense of fear.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
Paralyzing fear overcomes you. Whenever you move to a new tile, take 1 damage.
Roll a die at the end of your Hero Phase: 10+ discard this card.

Name: Terrifying Roar
Extra information: The distant sound of a roaring dragon fills you with fear, causing you to uncontrollably shake.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
You take a -4 penalty to attack rolls while this curse is active.
Roll a die and the end of your Hero Phase: 10+ discard this card.

Name: Time Leap
Extra information: You fall through a rift in reality as unfathomable energies warp the space around you.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
Remove your Hero from play. Draw a Monster Card and place its figure in the square your Hero disappeared from.
At the start of your next Hero Phase, place your Hero on any tile.
When your Hero returns, discard this card.

Name: Wrath of the Enemy
Extra information: The monsters single you out for attack.
Rule:
You are cursed! Place this card on your Hero Card as a reminder.
At the end of your Exploration Phase, find the Monster closest to your Hero that is not on your Hero's tile. Place that Monster adjacent to your Hero.
Roll a die at the end of your Exploration Phase: 10+ discard this card.

Name: Dragon's Tribute
Extra information: Ashardalon demands a tribute in gold from all those who take shelter under the mountain.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
When drawing a Treasure token, draw two and discard the one with the highest value.
(If one of the treasures is an item, discard the item.)

Name: Hidden Snipers
Extra information: Arrows and darts fly from the shadows.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
Whenever the active Hero ends his or her Hero Phase on a tile that does not have another Hero on it, the active Hero takes 1 damage.

Name: High Alert
Extra information: The monsters rally to defend the dungeon from invading adventurers.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
At the end of each Villain Phase, the active Hero passes one Monster Card (if he or she has one) to the player on the right.

Name: Kobold Trappers
Extra information: Traps set by kobolds are hard to overcome.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
You take a -4 penalty to diable trap rolls while this Environment is active.

Name: Surrounded!
Extra information: The beat of a distant drum warns you of the approaching hordes.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
At the end of each Exploration Phase, if a Hero does not control at least one Monster, he or she draws a Monster Card and places its figure on the closest unexplored edge.

Name: Walls of Magma
Extra information: The heat radiating from the magma-covered walls threatens to overcome you.
Rule:
If there is an Environment Card already in play, discard it. This Environment remains in play until a new Environment Card is drawn.
Whenever the active Hero ends his or her Hero Phase adjacent to a wall, that Hero takes 1 damage.

Name: Ancient Spirit's Blessing
Extra information: An ancient dwarf spirit assists you on your quest to rid the mountain of evil.
Rule:
The active Hero flips up a used Daily Power belonging to any Hero.
Draw another Encounter Card.

Name: Deadly Poison
Extra information: The toxin infecting you is unnaturally potent.
Rule:
Each Hero that is currently Poisoned takes 1 damage.
Draw another Encounter Card.

Name: Duergar Outpost
Extra information: The duergar maintain a small outpost in the mountain.
Rule: Draw 5 Monster Cards. Discard any Monster that is not a Devil. Shuffle the remaining cards and put them on top of the Monster Card deck.

Name: Frenzied Leap
Extra information: A monster leaps at you with supernatural speed!
Rule:
If a Monster is on the same tile as the active Hero, that Hero takes 2 damage.
Otherwise, draw a Monster Card and place its figure on the closest tile with an unexplored edge.

Name: Hall of the Orcs
Extra information: The crude holy symbols of Gruumsh painted on the walls hint at the nature of this sections inhabitants.
Rule: Draw 5 Monster Cards. Discard any Monster that is not an Orc. Shuffle the remaining cards and put them on top of the Monster Card deck.

Name: Hidden Treasure
Extra information: You spot a hidden cache of treasure a short distance away.
Rule:
Place 1 Treasure token on any tile that does not have a Hero on it.
Draw another Encounter Card.

Name: Kobold Warren
Extra information: The kobolds under the mountain tend to Ashardalon's every whim.
Rule: Draw 5 Monster Cards. Discard any Monster that is not a Reptile. Shuffle the remaining cards and put them on top of the Monster Card deck.

Name: Lost
Extra information: "All these tunnels look the same!"
Rule: Without looking at it, take the bottom Dungeon Tile from the stack and place it on top.

Name: Occupied Lair
Extra information: Many creatures call the place below the mountain home.
Rule:
Draw a tile from the bottom of the tile stack. Place the tile next to the closest unexplored edge.
Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on that tile. Place 1 Treasure token on that tile.

Name: Quick Advance
Extra information: Your foes advance with unnatural speed.
Rule:
Choose a Monster not on any Hero's tile. That Monster moves 1 tile closer to the active Hero.
Draw another Encounter Card.

Name: Revel in Destruction
Extra information: As you tire, your foe grows stronger!
Rule: Choose a damaged Monster. That Monster regains 1 Hit Point.

Name: Scream of the Sentry
Extra information: "Intruders!"
Rule:
If no Monster is in play, discard this card.
Choose a Monster. Draw a tile from the bottom of the Dungeon Tile stack. Place the tile next to the unexplored edge closest to that Monster. Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on the new tile.

Name: Spotted!
Extra information: Uneven ground causes you to scramble, alerting a nearby guard to your presence.
Rule:
Draw 5 Monster Cards. Discard any Monster that is not a Sentry. Shuffle the remaining cards and put them on top of the Monster Card deck.
Place the bottom tile from the Dungeon Tile stack next to the unexplored edge closest to the active Hero. Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on the new tile.

Name: Thief in the Dark
Extra information: You check your pack to discover one of your prized possessions has been stolen!
Rule: The active Hero discards a Treasure Card. If the active Hero has no Treasure Card, discard a Treasure token instead. If the active Hero has neither, the thief in the dark gets nothing.

Name: Unbearable Heat
Extra information: The volcanic vapors that fill the tunnels slowly wear down your endurance.
Rule: Each Hero takes 1 damage.

Name: Unnatural Corruption
Extra information: The Far Realm has an unnatural effect on the dungeon.
Rule: Draw 5 Monster Cards. Discard any Monster that is not an Aberrant. Shuffle the remaining cards and put them on top of the Monster Card deck.

Name: Wandering Monster
Extra information: A terrible monster wanders into view, attracted to your presence.
Rule: Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on any tile with an unexplored edge.

Name: Warp in Time
Extra information: Your thoughts are clouded as a pocket of corrupted time washes through the dungeon.
Rule:
Each player passes one Monster Card (if he or she has one) to the player on the right.
Draw another Encounter Card.

Name: Blinding Bomb
Extra information: The ceramic sphere explodes as it shatters against the nearby wall.
Rule:
Attack each Hero within 1 tile of the active Hero.
After the attack, each Sentry Monster in play moves 1 tile toward the closest tile wtih an unexplored edge.

Name: Bull's Eye!
Extra information: An arrow flies from the shadows!
Rule: Attack the active Hero.

Name: Concussive Blast
Extra information: An ingenious trap releases a blast of massive pressure from the volcano below.
Rule:
Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.
After the attack, move each Hero on the active Hero's tile to an adjacent tile.

Name: Deep Tremor
Extra information: A deep tremor shakes the dungeon as rocks fall from the ceiling.
Rule: Attack each Hero.

Name: Earthquake!
Extra information: The entire mountain shakes and rumbles.
Rule: Attack each Hero.

Name: Fungal Bloom
Extra information: An enormous puffball explodes, filling the air with poisonous spores.
Rule: Attack the active Hero and each Hero within 1 tile of the active Hero.

Name: Lurker's Strike
Extra information: A poisonous dart heralds the advance of a hidden foe.
Rule:
Attack the active Hero.
Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Phalagar's Lair
Extra information: You wander into the lair of an Underdark horror that strikes with a mass of tentacles!
Rule: Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Poisoned Arrow
Extra information: A disguised pressure plate triggers a trap, firing a poisoned arrow.
Rule: Attack the active Hero.

Name: Steam Vent
Extra information: The floor disintegrates as superheated steam gushes into the passage.
Rule: Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Sulphurous Cloud
Extra information: A slight rumble precedes a blast of noxious gas from a crack in the wall.
Rule: Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Trip Wire
Extra information: A careless step breaks a thin wire, firing a poisoned dart while sounding a distant alarm.
Rule:
Attack the active Hero.
Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on the closest unexplored edge.

Name: Volcanic Burst
Extra information: A nearby wall explodes, spraying droplets of lava throughout the area.
Rule: Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Waking Dream
Extra information: A corrupting influence from the Far Realm unleashes a waking nightmare.
Rule: Attack the active Hero.

Name: Cave In
Extra information: The ceiling above you collapses, choking the passage with rubble.
Rule:
Place the Cave In marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.

Name: Pit
Extra information: A pit opens beneath you, dropping you into the darkness.
Rule:
Place the Pit marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Attack each Hero on the active Hero's tile.
Damage: 2 and place the Hero on this card.

Name: Volcanic Vapors
Extra information: Cracks in the floor expel poisonous vapors from the magma pools below.
Rule: A Hero that moves onto this tile or starts his or her turn there is Poisoned.

Name: Lava Flow
Extra information: Red hot lava flows from a pipe in the wall.
Rule:
Place the Lava Flow marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Trigger the Trap during your Villain Phase: Place one Lava Flow marker on any tile adjacent to a tile with a Lava Flow marker, if possible. Each Hero on a tile with a Lava Flow marker then takes 1 damage.
Remove all Lava Flow markers when successfully disabled.

Name: Poisoned Dart Trap
Extra information: The trap launches darts coated in snake venom from holes in the wall.
Rule:
Place the Poisoned Dart Trap marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Trigger the trap during your Villain Phase: Attack each Hero on this tile.

Name: Rolling Boulder
Extra information: A giant boulder rolls down the corridor, crushing everything in its way! A giant boulder rolls down the corridor, crushing everything in its way!
Rule:
Place the Rolling Boulder marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Trigger the trap during your Villain Phase: Move the Rolling Boulder marker one tile toward the closest Hero. Each Hero on the new tile takes 2 damage.

Name: Whirling Blades
Extra information: A blade-covered top rises out of a small hidden compartment and spins wildly across the dungeon floor.
Rule:
Place the Whirling Blades marker on the active Hero's tile. If that tile already has a marker, discard this card and draw a new Encounter Card.
Trigger the trap during your Villain Phase: Move the Whirling Blades marker one tile toward the closest Hero, then attack each Hero on that tile.
